-波斯可又入狱了
-砰 警察就这样冲进来 太夸张了

translation.en: [man 1] I can't believe it. My boy Bosco…
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 那是我兄弟波斯可

translation.en: [woman 1] They came to his mother's house, locked him up.
translation.zh: 他们冲进他妈妈家 把他铐起来

translation.en: Free Bosco.
translation.zh: 放了波斯可

translation.en: The system's just always out to get us.
translation.zh: 政府总是想要抓我们

translation.en: -[man 2] It's a disgrace. -[woman 2] It's outrageous.
translation.zh:
-真丢脸
-令人愤怒

translation.en: How are the police acting like this though?
translation.zh: 警察怎么会这么做呢？

translation.en: Man, these feds ain't got nuttin' better to do. Free Bosco. Why am I hearing he's been locked up? Long day.
translation.zh:
这帮警察都不干正事 释放波斯可
他被关起来了？漫长的一天

translation.en: So you get one whiff of freedom, and now you're getting locked up again?
translation.zh:
你刚获得了自由
现在又被关起来了？

translation.en: [officer] No further action.
translation.zh: 无罪释放

translation.en: [Bosco] You know what? As a Black man in this England…
translation.zh: 你们知道吗？身为黑人 在英国…

translation.en: Easy on the bacon.
translation.zh: 少吃点培根

translation.en: …this world even,
translation.zh: 乃至全世界

translation.en: I'll never be seen as innocent.
translation.zh: 我永远不可能变得清白

translation.en: My name will always be up for question. But guess what?
translation.zh:
我的名字总是会被质疑
但你们猜怎么着？

translation.en: You can't hold a Champion down.
translation.zh: 你们是无法压制住冠军的

translation.en: And the next time you wanna come my mum's house to nick me,
translation.zh: 下次你们要冲进我妈妈家抓我

translation.en: make sure you have a warrant, blud.
translation.zh: 最好要拿着逮捕令 兄弟

translation.en: Look at them. Idiots. NFA, man. NFA.
translation.zh:
看看他们 白痴
无罪释放 老兄 无罪释放

translation.en: In a bit.
translation.zh: 回见

translation.en: [Aria] Why haven't I heard anything?
translation.zh: 怎么都没消息？

translation.en: -[drill whirring] -I feel sick.
translation.zh: 我觉得不舒服

translation.en: Don't worry about Bosco. He'll be fine.
translation.zh: 别担心波斯可 他会没事的

translation.en: [scoffs] He'll be better off than this gate was at the very least.
translation.zh: 至少他的状况会比这扇门还要好

translation.en: Yuh see dat bwoy?
translation.zh: 看到他的样子了吗？

translation.en: Him have a temper just like Aria.
translation.zh: 他的脾气就和阿莉亚一样

translation.en: Pure fire.
translation.zh: 一肚子火气

translation.en: Vita though? She's like mi.
translation.zh: 薇塔呢？她就像我

translation.en: She still. She focused.
translation.zh: 冷静、专注

translation.en: Don't mek her emotions run her.
translation.zh: 不会被情绪牵着走

translation.en: But Bosco, just like him madda.
translation.zh: 但波斯可呢 就像他妈妈

translation.en: I might let my emotions run me, Beres, but I ran this house, yeah?
translation.zh:
我或许被情绪牵着走 贝瑞斯
但我撑起了这个家 好吗？

translation.en: I ran this house when you couldn't.
translation.zh: 我撑起了这个家 但你没办法

translation.en: I was, uh-- [kisses teeth]
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: Ah suh yuh always ah come wid…
translation.zh: 你总是这样…

translation.en: [Vita] Stop, stop. He's coming.
translation.zh: 住手 他来了

translation.en: -[Memet] Chill out. -[Vita] He's coming.
translation.zh:
-冷静点
-他来了

translation.en: [Memet whispering] All right.
translation.zh: 好啦

translation.en: [Bosco] Oi. It's going off.
translation.zh: 嘿 东西快卖完了

translation.en: You know, in all these years, I've never seen you this hungry.
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我从没看过你这么饿

translation.en: [Memet] I have, you know. I really have.
translation.zh: 我有 我还真的看过

translation.en: Bos, I gotta ask you something.
translation.zh: 波斯可 我要问你一件事

translation.en: Ask then.
translation.zh: 问吧

translation.en: I think I should be your manager.
translation.zh: 我想我应该当你的经纪人

translation.en: Come on, Bos, man. You know I do a good job.
translation.zh: 拜托 波斯可 你知道我做得很不错

translation.en: -I been doing a good job. -No, Vita, man.
translation.zh:
-我一向做得不错
-不了 薇塔 妹子

translation.en: Dawn is useless. And I'm always, always by your side.
translation.zh: 唐恩根本没什么用 我会一直支持你

translation.en: Where was she when you got arrested this time and the last?
translation.zh:
这次和上次你被逮捕时
她人在哪里？

translation.en: Where was she when the organizers decided that Bulla should close the show instead of you, and I had--
translation.zh:
当主办单位决定由布拉压轴
她在哪里？而我呢…

translation.en: All right, Vita, man.
translation.zh: 够了 薇塔 妹子

translation.en: [kisses teeth] Sekkle yourself.
translation.zh: 别那么激动

translation.en: Let me sleep on it, get my head straight, and I will think about it.
translation.zh:
让我先睡一觉
等头脑清楚一点 我会想想看

translation.en: -Okay. -Jesus.
translation.zh:
-好
-天啊

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Memet] What are we doing now?
translation.zh: 我们现在要做什么？

translation.en: [Aria] Vita?
translation.zh: 薇塔？

translation.en: -Is that you? -[sighs] Yeah, Mum. I'm really tired.
translation.zh:
-是你吗？
-对 妈妈 我很累了 好吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: It's all over the Internet.
translation.zh: 网络上传得沸沸扬扬

translation.en: I've been here losing my mind, and you couldn't pick up the phone.
translation.zh:
我待在家里都快疯了
你却连电话都不打

translation.en: Mum, he's fine. He's home. Can we talk about this tomorrow? I'm tired.
translation.zh:
妈妈 他没事
可以明天早上再聊吗？我好累

translation.en: Vita, I told you already, you need to be telling me what's going on with him.
translation.zh:
薇塔 我已经跟你说过了
你要告诉我他发生了什么事

translation.en: -I can't go through this again. -Mum.
translation.zh:
-我不能再经历这种事了
-妈妈

translation.en: We need to make sure that he's okay. This police business--
translation.zh: 我们必须确定他没事 被警察逮捕…

translation.en: -Night, Mum. -It's not good for him, Vita.
translation.zh: 妈妈 晚安 对他来说并不好 薇塔

translation.en: -We need to be doing more. -[Vita] I said night, Mum.
translation.zh:
-我们要再多做一点事
-我说晚安了 妈妈

translation.en: I can't wait till we don't have to hide anymore.
translation.zh:
真希望我们不用再隐藏的日子
早点到来

translation.en: I can properly take you out, yeah?
translation.zh: 我可以光明正大带你出去 对吧？

translation.en: Show you off.
translation.zh: 向人炫耀

translation.en: And we can go on holidays.
translation.zh: 我们可以去度假

translation.en: Yeah. Let's just focus on telling Bosco first.
translation.zh: 对 但先想想要怎么告诉波斯可吧

translation.en: [Bosco] Yo, where you at?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在哪里？

translation.en: Yo, um… I'm at home, innit.
translation.zh: 嗯…我在家

translation.en: I'm at my home, in my bedroom.
translation.zh:
我家 在我的卧室里
我刚起床 你想说什么？

translation.en: -I-- I just woke up. What you sayin'? -[Bosco] Yeah, whatever, man.
translation.zh:
我家 在我的卧室里
我刚起床 你想说什么？ 好 随便啦 老兄

translation.en: Meet me at the label office at 1, and pick up Vita on the way. Come on.
translation.zh:
跟我在唱片公司一楼碰面
来之前先去接薇塔 快点

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Oh God, it's really happening.
translation.zh: 天啊 真的发生了

translation.en: What is?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Bosco's actually gonna make me his manager.
translation.zh: 波斯可真的要让我当他的经纪人

translation.en: I knew this day would come. I've got plans. I've got plans.
translation.zh: 我就知道会有这一天 我有好多计划

translation.en: V.
translation.zh: 小薇

translation.en: Why do you even wanna do this, man?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么做 哥们？

translation.en: Because I have been doing this.
translation.zh:
因为我一直在做这件事
该是我受到认可的时候了

translation.en: -It's time I got recognized for doing it. -I dunno, babe. I just think, like…
translation.zh:
因为我一直在做这件事
该是我受到认可的时候了 我不确定 宝贝 我只是想…

translation.en: Don't you wanna do suttin' for yourself? You've got talent.
translation.zh: 你不想为自己做一些事吗？你有天分

translation.en: Why don't you use it?
translation.zh: 为什么不好好利用？

translation.en: No, I'm better off behind the scenes, Mem.
translation.zh: 不 我比较适合幕后工作

translation.en: [sighs] All right. If you say so.
translation.zh: 好吧 你说了算

translation.en: [woman] Sorry for the wait. Team Champion?
translation.zh: 抱歉久等了 冠军队伍？

translation.en: -Yo. -They're ready for you.
translation.zh: 对 他们可以见你们了

translation.en: -[shutter clicks] -Cool. It's for your pass.
translation.zh: 好了 这是要放在通行证上的

translation.en: Can I get a quick pic of your manager?
translation.zh: 可以帮你的经纪人也拍一张吗？

translation.en: -Uh, here she is. -Sorry, running late.
translation.zh:
-她来了
-抱歉 我迟到了

translation.en: Oi, Memet, Vita. All right?
translation.zh: 嘿 麦梅特 薇塔 你们好吗？

translation.en: -All right, can I get your pic? -Yes, let's do it. Cool.
translation.zh:
-可以帮你拍张照吗？好的
-好啊 走吧

translation.en: I beg you get me a tea, please.
translation.zh: 可以帮我弄杯茶来吗？拜托

translation.en: Make sure it's got oat milk in it, yeah? Cow milk's dead.
translation.zh: 确定里面加的是燕麦奶 而不是牛奶

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You know it messes up my stomach, innit?
translation.zh: 你知道我喝牛奶胃会不舒服 对吧？

translation.en: -[Memet] V. -[Vita] This is bullshit.
translation.zh:
-小薇
-真是狗屎

translation.en: Don't be like that, man.
translation.zh: 别这样 妹子

translation.en: They do make tea here, you know?
translation.zh: 这里提供茶的 你知道吧？

translation.en: -[Honey] Are you all right? -[Vita] No, I'm not all right.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-不 我一点都不好

translation.en: Bosco basically said I can be his manager, yeah?
translation.zh: 波斯可说过我可以当他的经纪人

translation.en: Next thing I know, Dawn's walking in, and he's telling me shit about oat milk.
translation.zh:
但后来唐恩走进来
他只叫我去弄什么燕麦奶

translation.en: -Okay, shut up, shut up. I need you bad. -Huh?
translation.zh:
-好了 不要说了 我很需要你
-什么？

translation.en: -I need you to come meet me now. -Where are you?
translation.zh:
-你现在就来找我
-你在哪里？

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm gonna send you the address.
translation.zh: 别担心 我把地址传给你

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Come now.
translation.zh:
-你还好吗？
-现在就过来

translation.en: Bosco, good afternoon. How goes it? Are you well?
translation.zh:
波斯可 午安
最近怎么样？你好吗？

translation.en: Uh, I'm Philip. I'm going to be heading up our newly created street music division.
translation.zh:
我是菲利普
我将带领新成立的街头音乐部门

translation.en: I'll level with you.
translation.zh: 我坦白跟你说

translation.en: Your streaming numbers have gone through the roof since the arrest.
translation.zh:
你的串流成绩
在逮捕之后就一飞冲天了

translation.en: Honestly, money can't buy this kind of exposure.
translation.zh: 说实话 钱买不到这样的曝光度

translation.en: I've genuinely, genuinely never seen our marketing team more galvanized.
translation.zh: 我从来没看过营销团队这么振奋过

translation.en: Ooh, you hear that, Bosco?
translation.zh: 听到了吗？波斯可

translation.en: You, Bosco Champion, are gonna be a very busy man.
translation.zh: 波斯可·冠军 接下来可有得你忙了

translation.en: We're talking UK tour. We're talking hot new track.
translation.zh:
我们正在规划英国巡回演唱会
还有热门新曲

translation.en: So to cash in on the whole arrest thing, whatever, you bring that out now.
translation.zh:
为了善加利用逮捕这件事
你要趁热推出新作品

translation.en: We're thinking, and this is brilliant, we call it "Locked Up."
translation.zh:
我们在想 这太妙了
就叫做“关起来”

translation.en: And for the video, we can have you in a makeshift prison cell…
translation.zh:
至于影片 我们可以帮你
安排临时搭建的牢房

translation.en: -Uh, yeah, anything prison-- -I dunno about all that, bro.
translation.zh: 没错 关于牢房的… 我不确定 兄弟

translation.en: UK tour sounds peak, but I dunno about all that "locked up" stuff--
translation.zh:
英国巡回听起来很棒
但对“关起来”就没那么确定了

translation.en: Nah, he'll do it. Sounds great!
translation.zh: 不 他愿意 听起来很棒

translation.en: You're gonna be a busy man, Bosco. [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 你要忙起来了 波斯可

translation.en: [Vita] What's going on?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yes, I am gassed.
translation.zh: 是 我很兴奋

translation.en: Uh, about what? Honey, you said it was an emergency.
translation.zh: 关于什么？亲爱的 你说这很紧急

translation.en: It is. Okay?
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Where are we? -Come on.
translation.zh: 这是哪里？

translation.en: [Vita] Mate, where are we?
translation.zh: 姐妹 这里是哪里？

translation.en: Why are we even here?
translation.zh: 为什么会来这里？

translation.en: [Honey] Hey, boys.
translation.zh: 嘿 各位

translation.en: -Oi, Honey. -[Honey] How you doing?
translation.zh:
-嘿 哈妮
-你好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. All the glamour as normal. -Good up. -[Honey chuckles]
translation.zh: 跟平常一样有魅力 很好…

translation.en: [Honey] You know me. This is Vita. Glamour's not really her thing.
translation.zh:
你懂我的 这位是薇塔
魅力不是她的专长

translation.en: Where do I know your face from?
translation.zh: 我是不是在哪里见过你？

translation.en: Nowhere.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: One minute.
translation.zh: 等我一下

translation.en: For sure, you know. [kisses teeth]
translation.zh: 当然好

translation.en: Where you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: I'm about to do something that's gonna change our lives.
translation.zh: 我们要做一件会改变人生的事

translation.en: I don't wanna change my life. My life's just fine.
translation.zh: 我不想改变人生 我的人生没问题

translation.en: Look how your own brother fucked you over. Again.
translation.zh:
看看你哥是怎么搞烂你的人生
而且是再一次

translation.en: Don't you think it's time you did something for yourself? Trust me.
translation.zh:
你不觉得该是为自己
做点什么的时候了吗？相信我

translation.en: We're good. It's all good.
translation.zh: 我们可以了 没事了

translation.en: [Bulla] All right, then.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: -[man] Hey, you all right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？ 是

translation.en: There's nuttin' to be scared of, you know. We're all harmless in here.
translation.zh: 没什么好怕的 这里的人又不会害人

translation.en: -Are you sure? -[man] Yeah, I'm sure.
translation.zh:
-你确定？
-对 我很确定

translation.en: I'm Laurent, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 我叫罗兰

translation.en: Hi, Laurent.
translation.zh: 你好 罗兰

translation.en: Honestly, babe, just hear our voices. We're exactly what you've been missing.
translation.zh:
说真的 亲爱的 听听我们的声音
我们可以弥补你们的缺憾

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: We'll see about that, innit.
translation.zh: 等一下就知道了

translation.en: Let me see what you're dealing with.
translation.zh: 让我看看你们的本事

translation.en: [Beres] Yuh need to fix up, bwoy.
translation.zh: 你要打起精神 孩子

translation.en: It's my family yuh git di name Champion.
translation.zh: 你继承了这个家族的冠军之名

translation.en: -Wah mi always ah tell yuh? -Winners only.
translation.zh:
-我一向是怎么跟你说的？
-只会是赢家

translation.en: Mi cyaan hear yuh.
translation.zh: 听不到

translation.en: Look pon mi when mi ah talk to yuh!
translation.zh: 我跟你说话的时候要看着我

translation.en: -Winners only. -Dat's right. Champion.
translation.zh:
-只会是赢家
-没错 冠军

translation.en: -Winners only. -I get it. You ain't gotta lecture me.
translation.zh:
-只会是赢家
-我知道了 不要再说教了

translation.en: If yuh go back ah prison, what dat mean for di family?
translation.zh:
如果你回到监狱
对这家庭会有什么影响？

translation.en: -I'm not gonna go back there. -Awoah!
translation.zh:
-我不会回到那里
-那好

translation.en: Awoah.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -The label want me to go on tour. -Dem ah pay yuh fi dat?
translation.zh:
-唱片公司要我办巡回演唱
-他们会付钱吗？

translation.en: Yeah, they're gonna front the money.
translation.zh: 会 他们会先付这笔钱

translation.en: -Dunno if I wanna do it. -How yuh mean?
translation.zh:
-我不确定要不要照做
-什么意思？

translation.en: -Dunno if I'm ready for dem kinda tings. -Ready?
translation.zh:
-我不确定是否准备好要做这种事
-准备好？

translation.en: Ready? [laughs]
translation.zh: 准备好？

translation.en: Yuh betta git ready.
translation.zh: 你一定要准备好

translation.en: Wah yuh wait for, bwoy?
translation.zh: 你还在等什么 孩子？

translation.en: Go find yuh sister suh we can git to work pon a new track.
translation.zh: 去找你妹 这样才能筹备新的曲子

translation.en: And while mi remember, di people dem tell mi seh di rent ah late.
translation.zh: 我记得我们的房租已经迟交了

translation.en: -You ready? -No.
translation.zh:
-你准备好了吗？
-没有

translation.en: ♪ I was on the road tryna get bands ♪ ♪ Used to put the trap phone In the left hand ♪
translation.zh:
我在路上想要找到乐队
总是把手机放在左手掌

translation.en: ♪ Do the music And now they wanna bred man ♪ ♪ Beg you don't phone me Till the check lands ♪
translation.zh:
我做音乐 现在他们想要养人
支票搞定之前不要打电话给我

translation.en: ♪ I was OT in the Shetlands ♪ ♪ Ain't nuttin' that I won't do For the bread, fam ♪
translation.zh:
我在设得兰加班
为了面包我什么事都愿意干

translation.en: ♪ And that can mean Two in your head, fam ♪ ♪ Get a man marked like a exam ♪
translation.zh:
你脑袋里可能想到两件事
把人划掉 就像在考试

translation.en: ♪ Gyal tryna warn me 'bout the ex-man ♪ ♪ But still likes the mystique I'm a X-man ♪
translation.zh:
女孩想警告我前男友的事
还是喜欢魔形女 我是X战警

translation.en: ♪ Give it a week And tell her it's dead, man ♪ Straight face and delivery deadpan ♪
translation.zh:
等上一周 告诉她人已经死了
说的时候面无表情 板着脸

translation.en: ♪ Can't finesse, man I stay with a method like Redman ♪
translation.zh:
没办法 老兄
我跟红人一样是个方法人

translation.en: ♪ As for dem man Gang still put holes in headbands ♪
translation.zh:
至于那些人呢
帮派还是会在人们头上打洞

translation.en: ♪ Yuh zeet? ♪ ♪ Dat one deh waan me, she a freak But she nuh waan speak, she ah pree ♪
translation.zh:
那个想要我的人 是个怪怪女
但她不想开口 她可是美女

translation.en: [man] Sounds hard. ♪ I ain't got that time… ♪
translation.zh: 拿起车钥匙 我要离开 我没时间…

translation.en: [Laurent] Same lyrics. Jump on in the chorus, yeah? Go.
translation.zh:
同样的词 跟着唱副歌 可以吗？
开始吧

translation.en: ♪ Better watch you don't catch no strays ♪
translation.zh: 最好小心 你抓不到流浪汉

translation.en: ♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
translation.zh: 火车来了 我不知道目的地

translation.en: ♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
translation.zh: 这是单程车票 通往疯狂局面

translation.en: -♪ Life is a dream, time does come true ♪ -♪ Time does come true ♪ ♪ And in my sleep I think of you ♪
translation.zh:
人生是场梦 时机会成熟
在睡梦中 我想到你

translation.en: What is it? Ah, fuck. Just keep going.
translation.zh: 什么情况？该死 你继续唱吧

translation.en: -♪ Basically, probability ♪ -[Honey humming] -♪ Says that fate's come side with me ♪ -[Honey humming]
translation.zh: 基本上 几率说 命运站在我这边

translation.en: ♪ It's been so long on my shelf ♪
translation.zh: 我已经耽搁太久了

translation.en: I'll come in here.
translation.zh: 我从这里加入

translation.en: [both] ♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
translation.zh: 火车来了 我不知道目的地

translation.en: ♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
translation.zh: 这是单程车票 通往疯狂局面

translation.en: ♪ Situation ♪
translation.zh: 局面

translation.en: ♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
translation.zh: 火车来了 我不知道目的地

translation.en: ♪ I don't know where you're going, V ♪ ♪ But if you want You can come roll with me ♪
translation.zh:
我不知道你要去哪里 薇
但你可以跟我一起走

translation.en: ♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
translation.zh: 这是单程车票 通往疯狂局面

translation.en: Wow. Okay, that was good. That was good. Let's get some playback on that.
translation.zh: 哇 这很棒 重新放一遍来听听

translation.en: -[vocal playback] -[Laurent] Play that back.
translation.zh: 再放一遍

translation.en: -Run that, run that. -[Laurent] Bulla.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: Yo, I need to hear that now.
translation.zh: 对 我现在要听那首

translation.en: ♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
translation.zh: 这是单程车票 通往疯狂局面

translation.en: Yeah, get rid of that one there still. Yeah, yeah, yeah. That one's definitely not needed.
translation.zh:
还是把那一轨拿掉吧
很显然不需要那一轨的声音

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Get rid. Get rid.
translation.zh: 好 拿掉了

translation.en: -[Honey] What you doing? -We're just seeing. [Vita's vocal] ♪ Life is a dream, time does come true ♪
translation.zh:
-你们在做什么？
-正在听结果

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Yeah, that's it.
translation.zh: 好 对了 就是这个…

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 对了 就是这个…

translation.en: That's the sound. See you?
translation.zh: 这个声音就对了 你听到了吗？

translation.en: You got the voice. That's it.
translation.zh: 你的声音很棒 这就对了

translation.en: [Honey] What'd you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: We come as a pair, you know? Both of our voices.
translation.zh: 我们是双人组 我们两个人的声音…

translation.en: That's the way this business works. Let's get a bit more volume on that.
translation.zh:
这个行业就是这样运作的
把那个声音的音量再提高一些

translation.en: "Both of our voices."
translation.zh: “我们两个人的声音”

translation.en: V, come.
translation.zh: 小薇 走吧

translation.en: [Bulla] Here we go.
translation.zh: 好戏上场

translation.en: -Why were you singing? -What'd you mean?
translation.zh:
-你为何要那样唱？
-什么意思？

translation.en: -Why did you start whispering shit? -I didn't.
translation.zh:
-你为何要唱那一段？
-我没有

translation.en: Literally, trying to show me up, and now you've done it. Are you happy now?
translation.zh:
那会让我很难堪
现在你做到了 满意了吗？

translation.en: Why didn't you say anything when they said they're gonna cut me out?
translation.zh: 你怎么都不说话？

translation.en: They're gonna cut me out of the whole song! You said you--
translation.zh: 他们要把我从这首歌里剔除了…

translation.en: Oi. Oi, oi. Come on.
translation.zh: 喂 拜托

translation.en: It's funny though.
translation.zh: 但就是很好笑

translation.en: -Hey, don't laugh. -[Bulla kisses teeth]
translation.zh: 嘿 不要笑

translation.en: She coming back in?
translation.zh: 她会再进来吗？

translation.en: Hey, Vita. Hey, V.
translation.zh: 嘿 薇塔 嘿 小薇

translation.en: This is why I don't work with females.
translation.zh: 所以我不跟女性合作

translation.en: -V, hold up. Just a second. -What?
translation.zh:
-小薇 等等 等一下
-怎样？

translation.en: Now, look, you're not-- You're not gonna like what I'm about to say here,
translation.zh:
听我说
你可能不会喜欢我接下来要说的话

translation.en: but someone with talent like yours ain't ever gonna have it easy.
translation.zh:
但像你这样有天分的人
可不是随便就会出现的

translation.en: Look, I know the whole Bosco/Chantelle thing makes this tricky,
translation.zh:
我知道波斯可和香黛尔的事
让这变得有点棘手

translation.en: but I can make you a star.
translation.zh: 但我可以让你变成明星

translation.en: I'm good doing what I'm doing. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我现在的事情做得好好的 谢谢

translation.en: You're working in your mum's restaurant when you're not working for your bruvva.
translation.zh:
你不是在帮你哥做事
就是在你妈妈的餐厅帮忙

translation.en: Bosco's the one whose name everyone knows. He's the-- He's the golden boy.
translation.zh: 大家只知道波斯可的名号 他是红人

translation.en: And Vita's just someone who looks after him.
translation.zh: 薇塔只是在照顾他

translation.en: They're never gonna change.
translation.zh: 他们永远不会改变

translation.en: But we…
translation.zh: 但我们…

translation.en: we can change your life.
translation.zh: 我们可以改变你的人生

translation.en: -It could be amazing. -Look.
translation.zh:
-你的人生可以很精彩
-听着

translation.en: You don't understand, Mark.
translation.zh: 马克 你不了解

translation.en: That kind of thing doesn't run with my family,
translation.zh: 这种事在我们家是行不通的

translation.en: let alone Bosco.
translation.zh: 更别说是波斯可了

translation.en: Besides, I ain't a star kinda girl, so thank you.
translation.zh: 再说了 我不是当明星的料 谢了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Yes, you are.
translation.zh: 是 你是

translation.en: Trust.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: Anyway, you just think about it, yeah?
translation.zh: 总之 你想一下 好吗？

translation.en: -[door opens] -[Bosco] Yo, Mummy.
translation.zh: 哟 妈妈

translation.en: Hey, Bos.
translation.zh: 嘿 老哥

translation.en: -All right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-好吗？
-好

translation.en: Wagwan?
translation.zh: 在忙什么？

translation.en: Why you acting up, man?
translation.zh: 为什么要闹脾气 妹子？

translation.en: Don't be like that, man. It's just business.
translation.zh: 别这样 妹子 这只是生意

translation.en: All right, just gimme a likkle time with Dawn.
translation.zh: 好啦 给我一点时间跟唐恩谈

translation.en: Lemme sort things out, then it's all you. Yeah?
translation.zh:
让我把事情搞定
接下来就交给你 好吗？

translation.en: -That's cool. But actually, I was-- -Yeah, man.
translation.zh:
-那很好 那其实我…
-这就对了 妹子

translation.en: Dawn come through this time, innit? But I see what you do for me. Trust me.
translation.zh:
唐恩这次搞定了 不是吗？
但我知道你为我做的事情 相信我

translation.en: -I need to tell you something else. -I kinda need you to…
translation.zh:
-我要告诉你另外一件事
-我要请你…

translation.en: I kinda need you to help me make the song that the label want. Come on, man.
translation.zh:
我要你帮我写唱片公司要的那首歌
拜托啦 妹子

translation.en: Do I have a choice?
translation.zh: 我有得选吗？

translation.en: You know you wanna help your big bro.
translation.zh: 你知道你想帮你大哥

translation.en: I might actually have something that could work.
translation.zh: 其实我有些东西可能派得上用场

translation.en: This one.
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: ♪ Went jail for a likkle possession Intent or not, it's a weapon ♪
translation.zh:
为了手上的玩意而入狱
无论是不是故意 那是武器

translation.en: -Mm. -♪ Same time got a pending case ♪ -♪ Looks like I'm gone for a second ♪ -Mm.
translation.zh:
同时有个案子还没解决
看来我要消失一小段时间

translation.en: ♪ You know man's got expensive taste ♪ -♪ I need them creps in size 7 ♪ -Size 7, yeah.
translation.zh:
你知道男人的品味不凡
我穿七号的运动鞋

translation.en: ♪ I told my girlfriend that she can leave I came home, I knew she got that message ♪
translation.zh:
我告诉女友她可以离开
我到家就知道她收到了信息

translation.en: Pssh. What? -When did you start writing this? -When you first got out.
translation.zh:
-什么？你什么时候开始写的？
-你第一次出狱的时候

translation.en: ♪ That message ♪ ♪ I'm home now We gotta address it ♪
translation.zh: 那条信息 现在我回家了 必须处理

translation.en: ♪ Everyone waan know where man's head is ♪
translation.zh: 每个人都想知道这人的脑袋漂去哪里

translation.en: Nah, man, I'm not even saying that.
translation.zh: 不 妹子 我根本不会这样说

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Why you tryna get man emotional for? There's nothing wrong with my head.
translation.zh:
你为什么想要描写激动的部分？
我的脑袋没有问题

translation.en: I didn't say that.
translation.zh: 我没有那样说

translation.en: Sorry, Vita, this is the last of it. You weren't hungry, were you?
translation.zh:
抱歉 薇塔 这是最后一份了
你不饿吧？

translation.en: -[Bosco] Thank you, Mummy. -No. Let Bos eat.
translation.zh: 谢谢 妈妈 不了 给小波吃吧

translation.en: I've got some news.
translation.zh: 我有消息要宣布

translation.en: Who's gone and got you fucking pregnant, bro?
translation.zh: 谁让你怀孕了 妹子？

translation.en: -What? No one. What's wrong with you? -[Bosco] Oh. Good.
translation.zh:
-什么？没有人 你是怎么回事？
-那就好

translation.en: No, it's about my career.
translation.zh: 不 是跟我的事业有关

translation.en: -I told you, your time's coming, man. -No. No, Bos.
translation.zh:
-我说了到时候会交给你
-不 老哥

translation.en: I'm gonna be doing suttin' else. Suttin' kinda new.
translation.zh: 我要去做其他事 一些新的事情

translation.en: "New"? What do you mean "new"?
translation.zh:
“新的”？
你说“新的”是什么意思？

translation.en: I'm gonna be singing. I mean, we both know I can write, so…
translation.zh:
我要去唱歌了
我们都知道我会写歌 所以…

translation.en: Singing where?
translation.zh: 去哪里唱？

translation.en: Where you gonna find the time to do that when you're working for me and here?
translation.zh:
你要为我和餐厅工作
哪还有时间做那种事？

translation.en: Stop being silly, man.
translation.zh: 别傻了 妹子

translation.en: Well, you're not gonna like it, but at first, I'm gonna be singing on Bulla's new track.
translation.zh:
你不会喜欢
但我要在布拉的新歌里面献声

translation.en: Heard my voice. He thinks I might have suttin'.
translation.zh: 他听到了我的声音 觉得我有潜力

translation.en: -You're joking, innit? -Nah.
translation.zh:
-你在开玩笑吧？
-不是

translation.en: I spoke to Mark earlier. He's gonna trial manage me for--
translation.zh:
我跟马克谈过了
他会试着当我的经纪人…

translation.en: -Mum! Are you hearing this? -[Aria] Leave me out of it.
translation.zh:
-妈妈 你听到了吗？
-别把我扯进去

translation.en: Vita! That's my rival you know?
translation.zh: 薇塔 他是我的对手 你知道吧？

translation.en: This is about me doing suttin' I think I can do.
translation.zh:
重点是我
可以做我觉得自己能做到的事

translation.en: How you mean? You've been there with me since day one. You know how much that guy mads me.
translation.zh:
什么意思？你从一开始就跟我在一起
你知道那家伙有多让我生气

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I've been in it with you from day one, and I'm still in it now.
translation.zh: 对 我一直有涉入 现在也还是

translation.en: -Look at what I'm doing. -You tryin' to fuck up my comeback, innit?
translation.zh:
-看看我正在做什么事
-你想要搞砸我的复出对吧？

translation.en: Who can I trust to write with me if you go, huh? I'm fucked.
translation.zh:
你走了 我还能找谁一起写歌？
我完蛋了

translation.en: Write with you, or write for you?
translation.zh: 跟你一起写歌 还是为你写歌？

translation.en: Vita, please. Your brother's upset.
translation.zh: 薇塔 拜托 你哥心烦着呢

translation.en: When isn't he upset, Mum?
translation.zh: 妈妈 他什么时候不心烦了？

translation.en: When aren't I doing everything to make sure he's okay?
translation.zh:
我什么时候没有尽一切力量
确认他没事？

translation.en: If you'd let me be your manager, I wouldn't have to do my own thing.
translation.zh:
如果你让我当你的经纪人
我就不会去做自己的事

translation.en: -Within your lane, man. -Nah, nah, nah. I've listened to you long enough, Bosco.
translation.zh:
-留在你的轨道上 妹子
-我听你的话已经够久了 波斯可

translation.en: And I ain't staying in any lane. I'm gonna swerve right into yours.
translation.zh:
我不会留在轨道上
我会直接撞进你的轨道

translation.en: Look at the jealousy. I always knew this was gonna happen. I knew it.
translation.zh:
看看你嫉妒的样子
我一直都知道会这样 我就知道

translation.en: Jealous, Bosco?
translation.zh: 嫉妒 波斯可？

translation.en: I've been living, breathing, writing,
translation.zh: 从我有记忆以来 就一直在为你

translation.en: and lying for you ever since I can remember.
translation.zh: 生活 呼吸 写歌

translation.en: Everything I do is to make sure you're good.
translation.zh: 我所做的一切都是为了让你过得好

translation.en: But in your head, I was always gonna be in your shadow, innit?
translation.zh:
但在你的想法里
我只能活在你的阴影里 对吧？

translation.en: Well, it's Champion versus Champion now.
translation.zh: 那好 现在是冠军对上冠军了

translation.en: So get ready.
translation.zh: 做好准备

translation.en: ♪ Champion to the world ♪
translation.zh: 世人的冠军

translation.en: ♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
translation.zh:
只会是赢家 所以他们才说
我是你们这些女孩的冠军

translation.en: ♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.zh:
古驰绑在我腰上
每位冠军都需要腰带

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.zh:
英雄惜英雄
如果你是冠军 我看得出来

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
translation.zh: 我看得出来

translation.en: ♪ Champion to the world ♪
translation.zh: 世人的冠军

translation.en: ♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
translation.zh:
只会是赢家 所以他们才说
我是你们这些女孩的冠军

translation.en: ♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.zh:
古驰绑在我腰上
每位冠军都需要腰带

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.zh:
英雄惜英雄
如果你是冠军 我看得出来

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
translation.zh: 我看得出来
